p: The objective of this review is to summarize the reported biological activities and safety of the essential oils of sweet orange ( Citrus sinensis L.), bitter orange ( Citrus aurantium L.), neroli ( Citrus aurantium L.), orange petitgrain ( Citrus aurantium L.), mandarin ( Citrus reticulata Blanco), lemon ( Citrus limon Osbeck), lime ( Citrus aurantifolia), grapefruit ( Citrus Ã— paradisi Macfady), bergamot ( Citrus bergamia Risso & Poit), Yuzu ( Citrus junos Sieb. ex Tanaka), and kumquat ( Citrus japonica Thunb).
